title: Implement ScriptVerifier for custom verification scripts
acceptance_criteria:
1. NewScriptVerifier creates verifier for valid script path
2. NewScriptVerifier returns error for non-existent script
3. NewScriptVerifiers returns slice of verifiers for all valid scripts
4. NewScriptVerifiers skips missing scripts without failing
5. NewScriptVerifiers returns empty slice for empty config
6. Script Name() returns filename portion
7. Scripts execute correctly via sh -c
8. All unit tests pass
